headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: object_type
parameters.description: Object type. Use this field to specify whether you want to download the list of negative keywords for a campaign or ad group. Enum values: CAMPAIGN : campaign. ADGROUP : ad group.

parameters.name: object_id
parameters.description: Object ID. Use this field to pass in a campaign ID or ad group ID that you want to download the list of negative keywords for. Specify this field according to object_type : If object_type is CAMPAIGN , assign to this field a campaign ID. If object_type is ADGROUP , assign to this field an ad group ID.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.
